extendedInfo.description: Never forget when a new episode of your favorite TV show airs! Quickly add any show you like and profit!- No need to sign up for anything.- Has search titles for over 6397 shows!- Add the show episodes which have yet to air to your calendar, and sync with your computer!!- Has a watched feature!- Smart caching. Everything is available offline. (after youâve downloaded it)- Economical download options for users with a low-cost internet plan. (see settings in the app)- Blazing fast parsing of shows info.- Show summary and info from IMDB.com- Straight to the point interface for looking up info quick.- ICS 4.0+ Ready!All non-visual data is retrieved from epguides.com so every show you find there will be available in the app.All visual data is retrieved from thetvdb.comNOTES:*All air-times are based on the USA. Shows are often available the next day in Europe.*Previously known as TV Shows Guide.Also Iâm always open to suggestions, please donât hesitate to contact me.If you experience any problems please contact me before you leave a bad review and we can work things out :)!

reviews.title: Avoid
reviews.comment: Avoid using this program. Does not save lists. Have tried different settings but still won\'t save show list.

reviews.title: Very Cool!
reviews.comment: Love the ability to add the episode airdate/airtime to my Google calendar! Great app with excellent features!
